title: Good Will Hunting 2: Hunting Season
description: Will and Chuckie return to their Boston stomping grounds and they don’t like the sound of them apples. Clark better watch his back. It’s hunting season.
quote: You're just no longer that good--Will Hunting.
parent: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
altHero: Will (Matt Damon) holds a gun and Chuckie (Ben Afflec) makes a squinty face
alt1: Chuckie holds his fists up to fight
alt3: Will and Chuckie are in disbelief
alt4: Will and Chuckie huddle to discuss plans
